"Zoo-Revolution": Create an immersive virtual reality experience where visitors can explore and interact with animals in their natural habitats without leaving their homes.
"Zoo-Eco-Tourism": Develop a sustainable tourism program that focuses on educating visitors about conservation efforts and supporting local wildlife protection initiatives.
"Zoo-Sustainability": Implement a zero-waste policy throughout the zoo, reducing waste and promoting recycling and composting programs.
"Zoo-Innovation": Collaborate with researchers and scientists to develop new technologies and methods for studying and caring for animals.
